channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: More than 2,500 flights were cancelled on Sunday. Business travelers are scrambling to deal with the air-traffic cutbacks.
item.description: From flying privately to gassing up cars, different ways of getting from one destination to another are quickly being considered.

item.title: U.S. stock futures rise as Senate advances deal to end government shutdown
item.description: U.S. stock futures gained Sunday, despite coming off the worst week for tech stocks since April, as investors welcomed a tentative Senate deal that ma...

item.title: I have $12K in credit-card debt due to health issues and a 30% pay cut. Is it finally time to take a loan from my 401(k)?
item.description: “Because of a downturn in my industry, my pay was cut 30%.”

item.title: Trump floats idea of $2,000 tariff dividend checks to most Americans
item.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday floated the idea of payments of at least $2,000 to most Americans to show the benefits of his tariff policy.

item.title: ‘We can’t afford to buy a house’: My husband and I are building a house on my mother-in-law’s land. Are we asking for trouble?
item.description: “A single-family home where we live costs $600,000 or more.”

item.title: China’s earnings season is underway. Here's who’s benefiting from AI
item.description: China's artificial intelligence-related growth is giving corporate earnings a lift, according to UBS.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 tech stocks for their growth outlook
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks that are favored by Wall Street, including Amazon and Alphabet.

item.title: Carl Icahn returns to a familiar sector — auto repair — as he builds a 15% stake in Monro
item.description: Icahn has a long history in the automotive parts and services industry, so this investment could play out in several different ways.

item.title: Warren Buffett's cash fortress Berkshire closes gap with S&P 500 as AI worries depress Wall Street
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway's B shares and A shares moved 4.5% higher this week after a strong earnings report last weekend.
